description: This dataset contains the file of vehicle, snowmobile and boat registrations in NYS. Expired registrations are excluded. Records that have a scofflaw, revocation and/or suspension are included with indicators specifying this.

metadata.description: This dataset contains the file of vehicle, snowmobile and boat registrations in NYS. Expired registrations are excluded. Records that have a scofflaw, revocation and/or suspension are included with indicators specifying this.

name: Vehicle, Snowmobile, and Boat Registrations
